name: Rome: Total War™ - Collection
descr:
Once the Roman Empire is under your command, don't lay down your sword just yet - the Barbarians are coming. With two award-winning titles from the esteemed Total War series, you'll have twice as many obstacles and opportunities to control and conquer the greatest empire ever known to man.
					The Collection Edition includes:
 [b]Rome: Total War[/b] Guide one of three noble Roman families on a century spanning quest to seize control of the Roman Empire.
 [b]Rome: Total War - Barbarian Invasion[/b]
					 (official expansion pack to Rome: Total War) Witness the decline of Rome as Barbarian hordes attack, forcing a bitter internal struggle between rival factions.
 [list][li]Voted 2004 Best Strategy game by IGN, GameSpy and GameSpot.
 [/li][li]Fight alongside or against history's greatest leaders such as Julius Caesar, Spartacus, and Hannibal to expand or destroy the Roman Empire.
 [/li][li]Lay siege against the Romans as Attila the Hun, fearful Saxons, or other savage factions using signature weapons and abilities.
 [/li][li]Command warrior-tested legions in cinematic epic battles with thousands of soldiers on-screen at once.
 [/li][li]A century-spanning campaign charges players with strategically managing the economic, civil, religious and military arms of their empire.[/li][/list]

sysreq:
Windows
最低配置：
Microsoft® Windows® 2000/XP，奔腾III 1.0GHz 或者速龙 1.0GHz 处理器或更快的处理器，256MB 内存，2.9GB 未压缩的空余磁盘空间（额外 500MB 用于Windows 交换文件），100% DirectX® 9.0c 兼容16-位声卡和最新驱动，100% Windows® 2000/XP 兼容鼠标，键盘和最新驱动，DirectX® 9.0b，支持 Shader 1 的 64MB 硬件加速显卡和最新驱动。必须为 100% DirectX® 9.0b 兼容，1024 x 768 显示分辨率，支持互联网（TCP/IP）游戏；互联网游戏需要宽带连接和最新驱动；局域网游戏需要网卡（多人游戏）
重要事项：
部分显卡可能不兼容为全面战争：中世纪II优化的3D加速功能。请向硬件制造商咨询是否100%兼容 DirectX® 9.0b。
*
2024 年 1 月 1 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将仅支持 Windows 10 及更新版本。
